text.text: Get ready for brand new elements, a new design, and over 100 new features and changes!

features.title: Armatures
features.text:
Animate your models with armatures!

Instead of rigid object hierarchy rigs you can now create skeletal rigs that can bend your model and use weight painting to fine-tune how it moves!

features.title: Splines & Billboards
features.text:
Two brand new types of elements:

Splines make it easy to create shapes that follow a path such as tubes or cables.

Billboards let you add sprites into your scene that always face the camera!

features.title: New Design
features.text: Blockbench's design has been refreshed with new colors, rounded corners, shadows, and a new font.

features.title: Element Panel
features.text:
The Element Panel lets you see and edit element properties in one place!

Also, this update introduces panel tabs!

features.title: Expression Editor
features.text: The expression editor offers more space and tools to edit complex Molang expressions for your animations!
